Description: I purchased this Epiphone Limited Edition ES-335 Pro brand new in October 2018 and have played it lightly and only at home. It is almost MINT. However, I did sand the back of the neck a little bit (with 3M sandpaper, 2000 grit) to make it play more smoothly (the gloss finish on the neck was very sticky!). This is a very common practice especially on guitars in this price range. I didn't go too far with it and I think the guitar does play better, but I understand this affects its value (hence the "very good" grading and lower price). I'm attaching pics so you can see for yourself. Otherwise it's a perfect guitar, free from any scratches or dents, marks, etc. Plays and sounds incredible! Recently intonated, comes loaded with GHS boomers, 10 1/5 gauge. *** Will be available after January 17th, 2019 *** (Unless you want to pick it up before December 21st, 2018) No case, local pickup only in Manhattan, NYC.
Title: Epiphone Limited Edition ES-335 Pro - Cherry
